words.prompt: Adequate. That amount is adequate for the recipe. Adequate.
Accommodations. The hotel accommodations were very nice. Accommodations.
Absolutely. Are you absolutely sure about that? Absolutely.
Positive. It's important to have a positive attitude. Positive.
Achieve. You can achieve your goals with hard work. Achieve.
Aspirations. She has high aspirations for her future career. Aspirations.
Acquire. We need to acquire more knowledge on the subject. Acquire.
Necessary. Bring only the necessary items for the trip. Necessary.
Accessories. She bought matching accessories for her new dress. Accessories.
Algebra. We are learning algebra in math class. Algebra.
Aluminum. Soda cans are often made of aluminum. Aluminum.
Ballerina. The ballerina danced gracefully across the stage. Ballerina.
Broad. The road was very broad. Broad.
Beginning. Let's start at the beginning of the story. Beginning.
Believe. Do you believe in magic? Believe.
Bouquets. The florist arranged several beautiful bouquets. Bouquets.

Antidisestablishmentarianism. Antidisestablishmentarianism refers to a political position in nineteenth century Britain, specifically opposition to the withdrawal of state support or recognition from an established church (particularly in the context of the Church of England) Antidisestablishmentarianism.
